DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Update user status on service announcement messages
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to update service announcement messages' user status on behalf of the signed-in user. The message status can be marked as read, archive, or favorite.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Update your user status on service announcement messages
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to update service announcement messages' status on your behalf. Your status for messages can be marked as read, archive, or favorite.
